transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I'm a new patient. I hurt my knee a couple weeks ago and I'd like to come in and get it looked at.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thanks for calling PivotPoint Orthopedics, part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Alex?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: No, my name is Carlos Rivera.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it, Carlos. Can you please provide your date of birth?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Sure, it's July 7, 2000.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it, Carlos. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I injured my knee playing basketball about two weeks ago. It hurts when I go up stairs, so I'd like to schedule a consultation.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Understood.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thank you.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: For a new knee injury, I recommend a new patient consultation. Would you like to see a specific provider, or should I check availability with any provider?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I don't have a specific provider in mind, so any available provider would be fine.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it. Let me check for the next available new patient consultation with any provider. One moment while I fetch the openings.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Sure, thank you.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: There are no openings for a new patient consultation in the next week. Would you like

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, please let me know the next available slot after that.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: would you like to look for openings later in March?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that would be great. Could you let me know the available times in March?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it. I'll check for new patient consultation openings in March three. One moment while I look that up.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thank you, I appreciate it.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: The next available new patient consultation is Thursday, March fifth at three PM.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: That works for me. Please schedule it.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Would you like to book the

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, please go ahead and book that appointment for me.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: let me con

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thank you for scheduling that. Before I go, what should I expect before my first appointment? Do I need to fill out any paperwork?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Your appointment is set for Thursday, March fifth, at three PM with doctor Doody Hauser. For your first visit,

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Great, thank you. What should I do to prepare for the appointment?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: please bring a government issued photo ID and your insurance card. No paperwork is needed ahead of time. Would you like a text reminder for your appoint

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, a text reminder would be helpful. Thank you!

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: To prepare for your appointment, just bring your photo ID and insurance card, No other preparation is needed. If you have any recent medical records or imaging, you can bring those too, but it's not required.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thank you for the information. I'll see you on March fifth. Goodbye!
